pre_caption_prompt: Does the caption "The camera cranes down around the letters with a very smooth motion, then transitions into a counterclockwise roll, maintaining its steadiness throughout" correctly describe the camera motion in this video? Answer "Yes" or "No". And tell me why.
pre_caption:
Yes.

The video shows the camera starting close to the rock face with the letters, then moving backward and slightly downward to reveal more of the word. This is a crane down motion. The camera then rotates counterclockwise while maintaining a steady focus on the word.
